Package io.jans.casa.core

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
io.jans.casa.core.UserService
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.jans.casa.service.SndFactorAuthenticationUtils
@Named @ApplicationScoped public class UserService extends Object implements io.jans.casa.service.SndFactorAuthenticationUtils
An app. scoped bean that encapsulates logic related to users manipulation (CRUD) at memory level (no LDAP storage)
Author:
jgomer

      public int resetPreference(List<String> userInums)
      Resets the preferred method of authentication for the users referenced by LDAP dn
      Parameters:
      userInums - A List containing user DNs
      Returns:

    • searchUsers

      public List<Person> searchUsers(String searchString)
      Builds a list of users whose username, first or last name matches the pattern passed, and at the same time have a preferred authentication method other than password
      Parameters:
      searchString - Pattern for search
      Returns:
      A collection of SimpleUser instances. Null if an error occurred to compute the list
